#include<iostream>
//#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    //freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int lr,br,lt,bt;
        cin>>lr>>br>>lt>>bt;
        if((lr%lt==0 && br%bt==0)||(lr%bt==0 && br%lt==0))
            cout<<"yes"<<endl;
        else
            cout<<"no"<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
